## Objective
Clear, user-visible outcome (behavior to deliver).

## Scope & Starting Points
- Target routes/pages/components/files (full paths):
- Related docs to load (CLAUDE.md, PLANS.md, CODEX-QUICKSTART, REPO-MAP, domain docs):
- Data/seed setup needed:

## Acceptance Criteria (observable)
- [ ] Behavior 1 (include inputs/outputs or UI state)
- [ ] Behavior 2
- [ ] Tests/screenshots required for acceptance

## Required Commands
- Run `npm run quality --prefix frontend`
- Required Playwright suites (UI changes): e.g., `npm run test --prefix frontend`
- Additional commands (seeds, scripts):

## Evidence to Attach
- Playwright artifacts (paths under `frontend/tests/screenshots/`)
- Test output snippets (quality, targeted tests)
- Notable logs/errors (if any)

## Risks/Notes
- Known blockers, gates, or constraints (Supabase schema, env vars, approvals).
